discussion.content: Source > Filter > Threshold > Severity > Message Key

choices.F: Select the Lists tab in operator workspace
choices.A: In the right-click menu of an alert list, select Open in Workspace
choices.C: The application navigator Alerts Console menu item
choices.D: The application navigator Alert Intelligence menu item
choices.E: Within an open alert record, click the Open in Workspace button
choices.B: By appending/workspace to your instance URL

questions.question_text: Which is not a valid method for accessing alert intelligence?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is the correct answer as it asks which one is INCORRECT.
Appending "/workspace" in the instance won't redirect to Service Operations Workspace.

However, this question is a bit outdated given the Alert Console is replaced by Service Operations Workspace starting from Rome.

questions.question_text: To determine the top incidents for the CI associated with an alert, where is the best place to look?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is the best answer overall, same as others, now it is inside Service Operations Workspace

Selected Answer: A
Now in Operators Workspace
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/tokyo-it-operations-management/page/product/event-management/task/view-alert-insights-workspace.html

Selected Answer: B
B is correct answer.
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-operations-management/page/product/agent-client-collector/concept/acc-monitoring-overview.html
